title: That's great.
review: 9 points, Phoenix deserves an Oscar. The performance was so emotional that it expressed pain with uncontrollable laughter and even made people sad. The movie is completely different from most previous superhero movies, with no special effects, no wonders or even too many action scenes. But in a slightly retro way, why did the clown become that clown? In fact, it is a very serious film, including paying attention to social problems. The movie is quite evil and will make you feel some sympathy for this clown. In addition, this piece should not be sequel or derivative, because it is still too real. If this character is caricatured again, it will not be him.
